[Home](./index.md) &gt; [ToyGL](./toygl.md) &gt; [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) &gt; [multiplyByPoint](./toygl.matrix4.multiplybypoint.md)

## Matrix4.multiplyByPoint() method

Computes the product of a matrix and a [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md)<!-- -->. This is equivalent to calling [Matrix4.multiplyByVector()](./toygl.matrix4.multiplybyvector.md) with a [Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md) with a <code>w</code> component of 1, but returns a [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) instead of a [Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static multiplyByPoint(matrix: Matrix4, cartesian: Cartesian3, result?: Cartesian3): Cartesian3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The matrix. |
|  cartesian | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | The point. |
|  result | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md)

The modified result parameter.
